TypeSignature.Value: .class public sealed serializable SocketOptionName extends System.Enum
.class public auto ansi sealed SocketOptionName extends System.Enum

summary.para: Specifies option names for use in the and methods of the class.

remarks.para: Socket options determine the behavior of an instance of the class. Some socket options apply only to specific protocols while others apply to all types. Members of the enumeration specify which protocol applies to a specific socket option.
